ModuleType Class Reference

A class to define the different module types. More...

#include <ModuleType.h>

Static Public Attributes

static const unsigned int AHC = 0x1
static const unsigned int AHC8 = 0x2
static const unsigned int TCMT = 0x4

Detailed Description

A class to define the different module types.

Currently there are the

  • AHC Analogue HCal
  • AHC8 Analogue HCal for coarse layers. Only 8 chips instead of 12.
  • TCMT Tail catcher and muon tracker

The constants are defined to be a bit pattern, so they can be combined. 

  // only use AHC and AHC8
  UInt_t useModulesMask = AHC | AHC8;
